name: EFAP Minigame - The Sad, Sharting Onion
name_original: EFAP Minigame - The Sad, Sharting Onion
description:
All feedback, comments and suggestions appreciated below. Might do updates.
[Frame rate might chuck on some devices on full screen]

Patch notes:

V1.1:
- Text spacing adjustments
- More accurate conversion of mebes to rumps to fleps
(7000 mebes = 6 rumps = 1 fleps)

V1.2 (27.8.2021)
- Button prompt

V1.3  (29.8.2021)
- Splash screen
- Hide killzone when slow-mo begins
- Hide mebes etc text on results screen

V1.4 (31.8.2021)
- Fast Forward with left mouse button during flight
- Fixed typos

A reference to a game of Gartic Phone on the 150th Episode of Every Frame A Pause.

Source:

Programmed by yours truly.

Art and Images from https://www.efap.me/150

All Skyboxes are from the Unity Asset Store, available for Free
